Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.leader

Interface LeaderCard

All Superinterfaces:
Card
All Known Implementing Classes:
BoostAbility, DiscountAbility, MarbleAbility, StorageAbility
public interface LeaderCard
extends Card
The interface Leader card.

  • Method Details

    • isActive

      boolean isActive()
      Checks if the chosen LeaderCard is active on the board.
      Returns:
      true or false

    • applyEffect

      boolean applyEffect​(ProPlayer player)
      Apply the effect of the chosen LeaderCard to a Player.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to apply the LeaderCard effect to
      Returns:
      true if effect needs to be activated, false otherwise
